DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine change function performance biomechanics patient undergo spinal fusion corrective surgery adolescent idiopathic scoliosis ( AIS ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods consist movement study , questionnaire , chart review . The recruited subject follow usual clinical schedule pre-op , 6-week , 3 - , 6- 12-month post-operative follow-up visit . After sign informed consent , age time surgery , height , weight , body composition , leg length record use data processing . Chart review yield data Cobb angle , Lenke Scoliosis classification , instrumentation use surgery , level spinal fusion . All subject ask complete assessment activity level ( Marx Score , Tegner Activity Score ) , general health ( EQ-5D ) , validate scoliosis survey ( Scoliosis Research Study questionnaire SRS-22 ) . Movement study consist Lower Quarter Y Balance Test ( YBT-LQ ) , Functional Movement Screen ( FMS ) , measure forward flexion , right leave lateral bending , right leave trunk rotation . These measure assess preoperatively postoperative follow-up visit .
